Text: Its a meninaAll Heres a picture of Quinn Isabel Costello born on Sunday January th in Sao Paulo Brasil and weighing in at kg lbs and cm inches All three of us will be in the US for a visit sometime this summer as soon as Quinn gets her US and Brasilian passorts and we hope to see many of you then In the meantime please email us with news about all of you in the outside adult world we probably wont be getting out much for a couple of weeks Please email stefanie at her new address above Tchau Stefanie and Michael

sem assuntoHey Jeff Whats going on at Enron and more importantly what does it mean for you How are you in general and whats up Stefanie PS WHAT THE HELL IS DAVE HERMANS EMAIL ADDRESS

Re FW Its a meninaHi Jeffrey I was just thinking of emailing you happy birthday or happy birthday days late I can never remeber if it is the st or the th Which is it I dont know that Im really used to being someones mother I prefer to think of myself as an older sister Michael gets really annoyed and I think scared when I say that Im actually in tampa right now visiting for a couple weeks until June th Lezzie is coming in too this weekend with her daughter who my father described as the Bruiser Apparently shes on the larger side Not even fat just LARGE Ann Kelley will also be here with her daughter I will call you while I am here maybe today or tomorrow Not neccessary but if you want to send something to Quinn perhaps a piggy bank you could either send it to my parents house while Im here or to our address in Sao Paulo Below are both addresses I hope all is good with you will call for an update And Im very saddened by the passing of the Couch Potato I feel as though we need to have a service of somekind After the Delanostyle pool will there still be room in your yard for a small burial site Stefanie my parents address Bay Way Drive Tampa FL my address Rua Baltazaar da Veiga Edificio Balmoral Apto Sao Paulo SP Brasil

sem assuntoHi Jeff I think yesterday was Daves birthday Sorry I wasnt around to remind you but maybe you remembered on your own I still dont know what the hell his email is will you send it to me How are you How is work How is the house Did you put the pool in Whatever happened with Lisa All is good here been traveling a little Attached is a picture of me and Quinn from our last trip mostly because I know it will freak you out Were coming to the US next week We fly through Houston but for about an hour at am so Im guessing we wont see you Write or call for a second when you can Want to know how you are Stefanie
